name: Blue Forrest
description:
Blue Forrest is using Pygame (Python). This game purpose is you take the high scores in game. I make this game because i improve myself in Pygame and i very spend time for make. If suggestion in your mind write comment. This project already in beta.

If you come to the copyright or something process please contact me on Discord : ichuusy#2408

Else you found the bug please contact me on Discord : ichuusy#2408

Controls

ESC  = Back

Enter , Space = Enter

A-D-W-S , Arrow(LEFT,RIGHT,UP,DOWN) = Button Left/Right/Up/Down

Resolution : 1280x720
